item.description:
Meetup at MetroRock Gym in Everett.  Toprope, sport leading, and bouldering available, including some tall walls up to 55 feet.  Whether you're a new or experienced climber, join us for a fun and solid workout!  Gym meetups are also a great way to make more friends for outdoor climbing.  If you'd like to lead climb, don't forget to bring your rope :)

Meet UPSTAIRS in the LOUNGE/WORKOUT AREA from 7 - 7:10 PM.  If arriving later, just come find us on the walls. Hopefully you can recognize me (see "Event Host" above) from my picture.  And/or check the MeetUp Event comments (below) or the Whiteboard near the bathrooms at the gym, for a description of what I'm wearing that day.

If interested in starting earlier, give us a head's up in your RSVP comment -- and to help us find and recognize you:  Please write your name with the title "MEETUP" & what you are wearing on the Whiteboard and make sure you have a clear face picture of yourself posted on your profile.

If you've never climbed here before, you'll need to take & pass a belay test for rope climbing. Call the gym or see the website below for more info. Full-access Day Pass $18. Bouldering-Only Pass $15. Mondays are Women's Night: Women's Day Pass $10. More info and directions: http://www.metrorock.com/index.html
item.how_to_find_us: Meet UPSTAIRS in the LOUNGE/WORKOUT AREA; Check this MeetUp's comments and the Whiteboard at the gym for a description of what our host is wearing.
item.name: MetroRock Monday
